body:
Thanks, `Declarations.yaml` indeed seems far better so I've switched my code generation to use it and it made things quite easier.
Even if there are no stability guarantees, would you consider having `Declarations.yaml` being part of the libtorch binary packages like `https://download.pytorch.org/libtorch/nightly/cpu/libtorch-shared-with-deps-latest.zip` ? It's pretty minor but probably useful for other languages binding.
